humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the largest tumor, which is invasive lobular carcinoma with a size of 1.7 cm. Based on the rules provided, a T1 tumor is 2 cm or less in size. Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage of a cancer is determined by the size of the primary tumor. In this report, the size of the invasive lobular carcinoma is measured as 1.7 cm. According to the American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC) staging system, a T stage of T2 is assigned to tumors with a size of 2.0 cm to 5.0 cm. Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.
